job.title: Software Engineer - Backend
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <strong><u>About The Role<br><br></u></strong>At Uber backend engineers have to seek a wide variety of problems and situations as we continue to innovate and develop products. We expect engineers to be proficient in algorithms, problem solving, and crafting scalable fault-tolerant architectures. This includes being a specialist at your programming language of choice. Effective communication is an attribute in any engineer as you and your team move in the fast paced development environment.<br><br><strong><u>Basic Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience</li><li>2+ years of professional experience writing production code with C++, Java, Python, or Go<br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>At least five (5) years of software engineering experience<br></li></ul>
